long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Green Gamification Interactive Website for Ecological Impacts.

A Gamified portal explaining the impact of the oil spill will make it easier for citizens (Adults and Children) to interact with the website and understand the complex scientific terms related to the Oil Spill impact.
